Description: Beads: string of thirty-four glass beads and one fragment (the blue fragment of 1894,0816.278; EA68468); chiefly oval or globular, all of varying sizes and ranging in colour from violet and dark blue, through turquoise-blue, aquamarine-blue, and sea-green to leaf-green and yellow.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
